title: The Tyranny of Lost Things
description: Two hot summers converge, twenty years apart, as Harmony returns to the North London house where she lived as a child with her bohemian parents. Like theirs, her days are hazed by drugs and sex and cheap wine. Nothing else is the same in Longhope Crescent, but itâ€™s only here she can make sense of the anxiety and loss that plague her.
author: Rhiannon Lucy Cosslett
